hero.title: Build Beautiful Websites
hero.subtitle: with Modern Tools
hero.description: A production-ready starter template for building modern websites and landing pages with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.description: A complete toolkit for building modern websites and landing pages.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast
lightningFast.description: Built with Next.js 16 and optimized for performance. Get the best Core Web Vitals scores out of the box.

typeSafe.title: Type Safe
typeSafe.description: Full TypeScript support with strict mode enabled. Catch errors before they reach production.

developerExperience.title: Developer Experience
developerExperience.description: Pre-configured with Biome for linting and formatting. Focus on building, not configuring.

productionReady.title: Production Ready
productionReady.description: Includes testing, CI/CD workflows, and deployment configurations. Ship faster with confidence.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Start building your next website today with our production-ready starter template.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have a question or want to work together? Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

form.name: Name
form.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
